interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Natwag Makeup Remover Pads,18 Pack 3.74 Inch Reusable Microfiber Cleansing Pad with Laundry Bag Suitable for All Skin Types,3 Color Facial Cleansing Pad Set.
Review Date: 2020/08/25
Store: Natwag
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Natwag', 'Skin Type': 'All Skin,Dry', 'Material Feature': 'Reusable', 'Unit Count': '18.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '18', 'Package Dimensions': '4.4 x 4.37 x 2.59 inches; 3.84 Ounces', 'UPC': '745103569701'}
Review Text: I use these with my micellar water for my makeup removal and it works great. It was really easy to hand wash. I love that it comes with its own laundry bag if I choose to throw it in the washer. 18 pack, for the price ($10) is a steal!
Review Title: So soft and easy to hand wash
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
96 Pieces Glossy False Nails Oval Rhinestone Full Cover False Nails Pink Color Changing Gradient Short Artificial Nail Tips with 4 Pieces Nail Glue for Women Girls Nail DIY Decorations BBTO {'Material': 'Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene (ABS)', 'Brand': 'BBTO', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Number of Pieces': '4, 96', 'Package Dimensions': '11.5 x 7.32 x 0.5 inches; 1.59 Ounces'} You get what you pay for. The nails are pretty thin and that’s only alright for the short length, not medium which these are. There is only enough nails in each set for me to get both hands once. The others are wasted. I put the gradient color on first as it was the least trouble for this mommy of 4. All the others would REQUIRE a clear top coat. Jus touching the gold glitter n it started coming off. This gradient color could use a top coat to help it last longer but it’s fine. And before asking, I didnt bother trying the nail glue it comes with. If the nails aren’t great I wouldn’t trust the glue. For my regular fake nails I will stick with my short rounded French tips that are thicker and more durable than these. If I want something with color for a night or 2, I might put one of the others on. While I probably won’t buy these ever again they aren’t bad, jus not that good either to waste more of my money for another batch.
Edited review update: last pic is of my broken nail. It lasted 5 hours. Then I trimmed all my nails down n 5 more nails went the following day. There is no salvaging them either. It all split down the middle n not a small split either. It went almost through n just fell apart. And so I drop my ratings from 3 stars to 1. If I could give 0, I would. Cheap and that’s the quality too DROP THE BOMB Bbosong Sun Stick SPF50+ PA++++ 15g - Oil Free UVA/UVB Protection Sebum Control Skin Smooth Moisturizing Sunblock Stick Balm without Sticky, Primer before Makeup DROP THE BOMB {'Sun Protection': '50 SPF', 'Item Weight': '15 Grams', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'DROP THE BOMB', 'Package Dimensions': '3.5 x 1.7 x 1.1 inches; 0.53 Ounces'} When they say hypoallergenic, reef friendly, made with vegan ingredients, and calming natural ingredients I think it must be okay to order. But they don’t list their ingredients so I wasn’t sure if I should. And now I know why they don’t. I posted a picture of the ingredients if you would like to look them up yourself. The top half of the ingredients which take up most of what it is made of is made of: polyethylene(man made plastic), a chemical, acrylic or plexiglass, a few man made silicones, and chemical fragrances(some of them are really long words so I just put down the laymans terms.) I stopped looking it up at that point. I’m not putting this on as I’m allergic to a few of the ingredients. Hope this helps. They don’t list ingredients but I have a picture of it Natwag Makeup Remover Pads,18 Pack 3.74 Inch Reusable Microfiber Cleansing Pad with Laundry Bag Suitable for All Skin Types,3 Color Facial Cleansing Pad Set. Natwag {'Brand': 'Natwag', 'Skin Type': 'All Skin,Dry', 'Material Feature': 'Reusable', 'Unit Count': '18.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '18', 'Package Dimensions': '4.4 x 4.37 x 2.59 inches; 3.84 Ounces', 'UPC': '745103569701'} I use these with my micellar water for my makeup removal and it works great. It was really easy to hand wash. I love that it comes with its own laundry bag if I choose to throw it in the washer. 18 pack, for the price ($10) is a steal! So soft and easy to hand wash
profile:
**User Profile Summary (Updated):**

- **Nail Product Preferences:** User prefers short, durable nails, specifically rounded French tips, and values quality and thickness in artificial nails for better durability. Interested in colorful options for occasional use, they prioritize practicality, longevity, and quality, especially in finishes like gradients and glitter.

- **Style:** User aims for a balance between vibrant designs and dependable products, ensuring that occasional flair does not compromise on reliability.

- **Quality Concerns:** User has expressed significant dissatisfaction with previous purchases due to thinness and lack of durability, which has influenced their ratings negatively.

- **DIY Approach:** They take a hands-on approach to nail care, enjoying creating designs at home, and prioritize products that are convenient and easy to apply.

- **Budget Awareness:** User is conscious of value, wary of investing in products, whether for nails or skincare, that do not meet their expectations.

- **Ingredient Sensitivity:** They have a particular concern for product ingredients due to allergies, leading to a preference for natural and hypoallergenic formulas, especially in skincare.

- **Family Life Impact:** User's busy lifestyle, especially with children, affects their choice for manageable and reliable beauty solutions.

- **New Preference:** Recently, user has highlighted a strong appreciation for reusable products that simplify their routine while being cost-effective, demonstrating an ongoing commitment to sustainability alongside their practicality drivers.

Overall, practicality, quality, ingredient transparency, and ease of use remain central to the user’s approach to beauty products.
